Container.Name: Sortify
Container.Overview: Sortify is an intelligent media file organizer with a modern drag-and-drop web interface. It automatically organizes your photos and media files by date with smart date extraction from filenames and EXIF data, creating a structured folder hierarchy (YYYY/Month).

Config.Name: Media Storage
Config.Description: Path where organized media files will be stored. Sortify will create YYYY/Month folder structure here.

Config.Name: Temp Directory
Config.Description: Temporary directory for file uploads and processing

Config.Name: Media Path
Config.Description: Internal container path for media storage (leave as default)

Config.Name: Temp Path
Config.Description: Internal container path for temporary files (leave as default)

Config.Name: CORS Origins
Config.Description: Allowed CORS origins (comma-separated). Use * for all origins or specify your domain

Config.Name: PUID
Config.Description: User ID for file permissions (should match your media files owner)

Config.Name: PGID
Config.Description: Group ID for file permissions (should match your media files group)
